result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'Derville entre.' indicates the entrance of a character onto the stage, which fits into the 'entrance' category.
The stage direction 'Il sort en chantonnant de nouveau le refrain de l'Amant d'Amanda.' describes the manner in which a character exits, specifically by singing, which fits the 'delivery' category.
result_list.stgdir: Il sort en chantonnant de nouveau le refrain de l'Amant d'Amanda.

result_list.explanation: This stage direction describes a narrative sequence involving characters' emotions and reactions to an event, which fits the 'narration' category due to its length and detail.
result_list.stgdir: Adeline, Eglante, Necelle, sont toutes tremblantes , craignant que l'ordre ne soit contre elles. Elles ne se rassurent un peu, que lorsqu'elles sont certaines que l'exempt n'en veut qu'à la Marquise, qu'elles ont cru jusqu'à ce moment une nouvelle débarquée de province, qui était venue, comme le chevalier le leur a dit, pour débuter à l'Opéra.

result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'Air: Nous sommes précepteurs d'amour.' specifies a tune title, indicating that music will be involved, which fits the 'music' category.

This stage direction describes character movement and behavior upon entering, such as 'rentre vivement, l'oeil hagard,' which fits the 'movement' category as it involves motion without indicating an entrance or exit.
result_list.stgdir: Il rit. Laurent rentre vivement, l'oeil hagard, comme s'il était poursuivi ; il s'appuie un instant contre l'armoire.

result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'Antelme s'en va.' indicates a character exiting the stage, fitting into the 'exit' category.
The stage direction describes women giving sword knots to men, which involves interaction with an object, fitting the 'object' category.
result_list.stgdir: Les femmes donnent aux hommes des noeuds d'épée etc.

result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'Il s'accroche à un des rosiers de l'Ecole des Femmes.' describes a character physically interacting with an object, specifically a rose bush, fitting the 'interaction' category.
result_list.stgdir: Il s'accroche à un des rosiers de l'Ecole des Femmes.

result_list.explanation: This stage direction 'Se retournant vers les Spectateurs.' indicates that a character is addressing or looking towards the audience, which fits the 'aparte' category.
The direction 'Au poète.' indicates that a speech or action is directed towards the poet, fitting the 'toward' category as it identifies the addressee of a speech or action.
